page.title: 16A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Richard Dyer and I am 13 years old. I have one brother who is 15 years old. I live just outside the centre of{Newcastle.} I start my{school day}at 7.00 a.m. I get up, get washed and then set out for my{paper round.}This normaly takes me until about 7.30am. Then I have my breakfast and leave for school. I get into town and then change buses to meet my friends. I get to school and talk to my friends about the night before. At lunch time I go out to the field and do athletics training as I run for the school.I am a Second Year{prefect}which involves looking after the sweet and drinks machines.After school I do my home work and the go out to play football.I then come in and watch television and go to bed at about 11.00p.m.
